scripts.cd demo: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && npm run reload
scripts.reload: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-pager && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.ng.preparedemo: npm run build && npm run ng.reload
scripts.ng.reload: cd demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-pager && tns plugin add ..
scripts.ng.demo.ios: npm run ng.preparedemo && cd demo-ng && tns emulate ios
scripts.ng.demo.ios.device: npm run ng.preparedemo && cd demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.ng.demo.android: npm run ng.preparedemo && cd demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
scripts.prepublish: npm run ngc && npm run build
